//DashBoard items Name Goes Here Pet Breed Goes Here
//About ABOUT The Lumos team has developed a cutting-edge mobile application called the pet feeder, which is designed to schedule and automate the feeding of pets. Pet feeders are particularly useful for busy pet owners or those who travel frequently. Additionally, they can help regulate a pets eating habits, preventing overeating or under-eating. Ultimately, pet feeders are a valuable tool for pet owners who want to provide their furry companions with consistent access to food.
//Credits CREDITS The Feed and Find Initiative Team
